mapper.select: select ag.seq as seq, buyer.seq as buyerSeq,buyer.name as buyerName, buyerDetail.address as buyerAddress, buyerDetail.tel as buyerTel, seller.seq as sellerSeq, seller.name as sellerName, sellerDetail.address as sellerAddress , sellerDetail.tel as sellerTel, b.biddingPrice as price from tblAuctionGoods ag inner join tblBid b on ag.seq = b.auctionseq inner join tblMember buyer on buyer.seq = b.memberseq inner join tblMemberDetail buyerDetail on buyerDetail.seq = buyer.seq inner join tblMember seller on seller.seq = ag.memberseq inner join tblMemberDetail sellerDetail on sellerDetail.seq = seller.seq where ag.seq=#{seq} and b.auctionstatusseq=2
